text: ninsanka te'omam eka evum jutha pana che je kitaba padhata-padhata potani jibhane maradi nakhe che jethi tame tene kitabanum ja lakhana samajo, parantu kharekhara te kitaba (kura'ana) num lakhana nathi ane te'o kahe pana che ke te allaha ta'ala taraphathi che, parantu kharekhara te allaha ta'ala taraphathi nathi, te to khulli rite allaha ta'ala para juthanum bandhe che
